meaning_str.bing:
n. 内部
adv. 在内部；在里面
prep. 不出（某段时间）；在（某段时间）之内；不出（某段距离）
网络. 在…里面；在…之内；以内

不出（某段时间）；在（某段时间）之内；不出（某段距离）

在…之内；在…范围内；在…的内部；在…的限度内；在…时间内；在…距离内；在…的领域内；不出（某范围或限度）
在范围之内；在界限以内

1.en: Every time a Facebook or Twitter executive burps within earshot of the media, the question of a public offering seems to emerge.
1.cn: 不管facebook和twitter有什么小小的动静都会引起媒体极大地关注，这一次的动静是关于——首次公开募股。

2.en: Within a few days the goals had settled into a plan to do something and a fair idea of what it would be.
2.cn: 几天之内目标就设定进了计划，还有一些它应该是什么的构思。

3.en: The best heat-insulating solids own their insulating properties to the air or to other gases contained in cells within the material.
3.cn: 最好的隔热材料在空气和材料细胞中拥有自己的绝热性能。

0.cn: 他们还活着，杰克，他们和爱娃在一起。

1.en: Within minutes, you will be dead. Okay. Got it?
1.cn: 几分钟之内就会毙命。好的。明白了？

2.en: Twenty bucks says they're married within the month.
2.cn: 我赌二十块钱，他们一个月内就会结婚。

3.en: Within 30 years, we could have a colony of hundreds.
3.cn: 三十年后，就会有几百人的殖民地了。

4.en: He was within my view from approximately 6:55 to 7:45.
4.cn: 他一直在我视线内，大概6:55到7:45之间都在。

5.en: Increased acceleration toward the object. Estimated contact within two minutes.
5.cn: 朝目标移动的加速度已增加。预计两分钟后到达目标。

6.en: Within 48 hours, he was picked up by the Houston Rockets.
6.cn: 48小时后他被休斯敦火箭队接收

7.en: I was with Mr. Sweeney, or within his sights, from 6:55 until 7:45.
7.cn: 我一直跟斯威尼先生在一起，或者说在他视线里，从6:55到7:45都在。

8.en: I'm still within earshot! You may want to wait for my door to close.
8.cn: 我现在还能听得到！你们得等我把门关上。

9.en: Professor? What exactly does legend tell us lies within the Chamber?
9.cn: 麦格教授？传说有没有告诉我们密室中的东西是什么？

10.en: We can't start a hack on them until they're within a two mile range.
10.cn: 他们要在两英里范围之内我们才能开始攻击他们的系统。

11.en: All of these policies are common sense. All of them are within our reach.
11.cn: 所有这些政策都是常识性的，所有这些都在我们能力范围之内。

12.en: Emotions run deep within our race, in many ways more deeply than in humans.
12.cn: 我们的种族把情感隐藏的很深，在很多情况下，要比人类深得多。

13.en: What do you mean? You said 82% find employment within a year of graduating.
13.cn: 什么意思？你说82%都在毕业后的一年内找到了工作。

14.en: In my case, that time has fallen within the very first days of my presidency.
14.cn: 对我而言我上任之初就要面对这个难题了。

15.en: To have a desire build up within you and be denied any opportunity for release.
15.cn: 心中逐渐建立起了强烈的欲望，最后却只能憋着，无处释放。

16.en: Not just for the treasure within, but for where it lies, its strategic position.
16.cn: 不只是为了山里的财宝，更是为了它的战略位置。

17.en: They've somehow created a hyper-lightspeed weapon built within the planet itself.
17.cn: 他们在星球内部建造了某种超光速武器。

18.en: But she warned him not to be deceived by appearances. For beauty is found within.
18.cn: 但老婆婆警告王子不要以貌取人，真正的美在于内心。

19.en: Choose wisdom over wrath. Heal any rifts within yourself, your armies, your people.
19.cn: 选择智取而非力敌，治愈你自己，你的敌人和你的子民心中的裂痕。
